title: $\PGL$ orbits on products of flag varieties
abstract:
In this paper, we study the existence of a dense orbit for the diagonal
$\PGL(n)$ action on self-products of partial flag varieties. We determine when
there exists a dense orbit for flag varieties of the form $F(k_1, \dots, k_r;
n)^m$ when $k_i = i$ or when $m=3$ and $k_i = \ell + i$ for some $\ell \geq 0$.
We also show that certain infinite families of products do not have a dense
orbit.
